Package vista.graph

Interface Summary
Animate An interface for elements that animate
AnimationObserver A element that needs to be an observer needs to implement this interface
Attributes  
Bounded This interface is implemented by any object that has bounds defined by a rectangular region.
BoundedComposite This interface defines the layoutable object.
Composite A composite of bounded objects.
CompositeIterator An interface for iterating over the leaves of the Composite interface
CurveDataModel An interface containing the data required for drawing a Curve.
Drawable This defines the interface for objects that can draw themselves in a given region.
DrawableComposite This is an interface to a composite of drawable elements.
ElementContext This interface is implemented by any Canvas container that contains a GraphicElement object
FontResizable Any class that implements this interface has a method that allows the resizing of font by scaling, heuristics or strict bounds.
GELayoutManager This interface provides methods for managing the layouts of BoundedComposite objects which contain other Bounded objects ( which may themselves be Composites).
GraphFactory A factory for producing GraphicElement objects.
GraphFrameInterface  
Layoutable This interface defines the layoutable object.
LayoutMediator Mediates between layout managers to synchronize or exchange layout information
PieChartModel  
PieModel  
ProfilePlotModel  
RangeActor This is the interface implemented by a class that is interested in using the range selector and which needs to be informed about the range selected and when the selection operation is completed
RangeSelected Represents the state of selection of a 2D area
RequestHandler An interface defining the call back functions when the schematic recives meaninful input
ScaledElement A identifier interface for scaled elements
SchematicDataModel This interface is to be implemented by any class that wishes to provide data for the schematic.
SchematicSymbolData This class contains the symbol to be added, its anchor point and other diagonally opposite points ( in double x,y) and the reference object to be associated with that element.
SymbolData Data for adding symbol or line to schematic
TickGenerator Generates information for tick placement and their associated labels using a range of given maximum and minimum.
 

Class Summary
AnchoredElement  
AnimateElement The base class for objects that need to be animated.
AnimationObservable A non-thread based class for efficiency.
Animator This class handles the animation.
AnimatorCanvas  
AnimatorFrame This class constructs a frame and provides the context with which to interact with the Graph object.
AttributeSerializer This class serializes the properties of the graph to a ascii file in the Properties format.
Axis Axis contains a TickLine for ticks, TickText for tick labels, TextLine for axis labels.
AxisAttr Attributes of a Axis element
AxisDataSetMediator Mediates information flow between an axis and data sets.
AxisDialogPanel An editor for the attributes and state of the TextLine object
CircleSymbol A circle symbol
ColorChoice Displays a label and a small rectangle of given color.
ColorRGB Defines the rgb representation of colors by their names.
CoordinateDisplayInteractor Displays the co-ordinates of a point in the drawing region of the plot.
Curve A superclass of all curves.
CurveAttr Attributes for the Curve Element
CurveContainer A container for curves independent of plot
CurveDialogPanel An editor for the attributes and state of the Curve object
CurveLegendLine A line which represents the curve characterstics.
CurveLegendLine2D A line which represents the curve characterstics.
CurvePathIterator A PathIterator for the Curve to outline its shape.
DefaultCurve Draws a default curve.
DefaultCurveDialogPanel An editor for the attributes and state of the Curve object
DefaultGraphFactory A factory for producing GraphicElement objects.
DoublePoint  
DoubleRect  
Draggable This class is useful when a graphic element is being dragged.
DrawIterator Defines the order of drawing elements
ElementInteractor This class handles interaction of mouse and mouse motion with Element class and its components.
FlaggedCurve Draws a default curve.
FlaggedCurve2D Draws a default curve.
FontChoice Displays fonts available in the system and enables selection of font family, style and size.
FontResizeInteractor Resizes font proportionally when graph gets resized
GEAttr Encapsulates all attributes of a GraphicElement.
GEBorderLayout Lays out the elements in North, South , East , West and Center positions.
GEBorderLayoutMediator Mediates between layout managers to synchronize or exchange layout information
GECanvas This class handles the passing of messages to and from the GraphicElement object.
GEContainer This the base class for all graphic element container classes.
GEDialog A dialog class for handling attribute change requests.
GEDialogPanel A dialog class for handling attribute change requests.
GEGridLayout  
GELineLayout Lays out Bounded(s) in a linear fashion.
GEMultiBorderLayout Lays out the elements in North, South , East , West and Center positions.
GEOverlayLayout Lays out Bounded(s) on top of each other.
GEScaledLayout This interface provides methods for managing the layouts of BoundedComposite objects which contain other Bounded objects ( which may themselves be Composites).
GETickLayout Lays out Bounded(s) such that their bounds are centered on the ticks as specified in the given TickData.
GETree Constructs a tree view for the the GEContainer.
GETreeDialog Initializes a tree dialog for a GEContainer and redraws the containing canvas on apply/done button press.
GifEncoder  
Graph This class manages the plot, its title and its legend.
GraphAttr Attributes of a graph.
GraphicElement This the base class for all graphic components.
GraphProperties  
GraphTemplate  
GraphUtils A set of static methods for utility functions
Grid This controls the drawing of a line within the bounds of the given rectangle.
GridAttr Attributes for Grid.
ImageEncoder  
ImageSerializer This class saves the image of a given component to a file in various formats
InfoDialog A dialog for displaying information.
InsetsEditPanel A panel to edit insets.
JpegEncoder  
Labels  
LayeredSchematic  
Legend This is an aggregate of LegendItem(s).
LegendAttr Attributes of a Plot
LegendItem A legend item for each Curve on the Plot consisting of a LineElement and associated TextLine.
LegendItemAttr Attributes of a LegendItem
LineDataModel An interface containing the data required for drawing a Curve.
LineElement This controls the drawing of a line within the bounds of the given rectangle.
LineElementAttr Attributes for the line elements
MultiPlot A class containing a set of Plot objects.
PieChart  
Plot A plot is defined as an area with atmost four axes aligned so as to make up a rectangle.
PlotAttr Attributes of a Plot
PolyLineElement This class draws a poly line using itself as a GEContainer to which the LineElement ( a graphic element ) is added at the appropriate places to simulate the line.
Print2D  
Printable2D  
PrintPreviewer A print previewer
RangeSelector Selects a range on the x axis.
ReferenceCurve A curve which can toggle between displaying and not displaying flags
ResizeInteractor Handles component resize events and calls Graph.setBounds to redo layout of graph
Rotator2D This class
Scale This class encapsulates scaling information and methods.
Schematic A schematic of symbols.
SchematicCanvas A canvas for drawing the schematic.
SimpleTickGenerator Uses labeling by converting the tick value to its float representation of a string.
Symbol Symbol is a polygon shape drawn with respect to the x and y coordinates of rectangle.
SymbolAttr Attributes for a symbol
SymbolDialogPanel An editor for the attributes and state of the Curve object
SymbolFactory  
TextDialogPanel An editor for the attributes and state of the TextLine object
TextLine Draws a line of text within given bounds.
TextLineAttr Attributes of a TextLine
TickData This class encapsulates tick data information such as the data values at which to place ticks and the length of the tick as a percentage of the drawing area.
TickLine This implements a line with major ticks and minor ticks.
TickLineAttr Attributes of TickLine
TickText A class handling TextLine objects which share common data values.
TickTextAttr Attributes of a TickText
TimeTickGenerator Generates information for tick placement and their associated labels using a range of given maximum and minimum.
Zoom This class handles the zooming in and zooming out on Graph class.
ZoomInteractor This class handles interaction of mouse and mouse motion with Graph class and its components.
ZoomOverview Shows the zoom overview into the plot.
